name: The unknown survivor
description:
You take control of a young boy with brain damage, in a poor country abandoned by his family and forced to fight to survive.

You must find food before you die of starvation.

Explore the map in search of food and navigate your player like an FPS game:

CONTROLS:

use: WASD to move OR use: ZQSD to move,

use mouse to look.

use space to jump.
